statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ -2 \\ 16 \\ 10 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 21 \\ 7 \\ -35 \\ -21 \\ 14 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
